update media
md_name = #{mdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_url = #{mdUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_th_id = #{mdThId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
md_info = #{mdInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

md_num = #{mdNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where md_id = #{mdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update media set md_name = #{mdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md_url = #{mdUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md_th_id = #{mdThId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, md_info = #{mdInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md_type = #{mdType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, md_price = #{mdPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, md_num = #{mdNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, md_mm_id = #{mdMmId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where md_id = #{mdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select from media md inner join mycollection m on md.md_id=m.mc_md_id where m.mc_u_id = #{mcUId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
